name: Loading Trificator
description:
Watch the Making Of! (Spanish):

You are the villan... stop the heros of stopping you!

With your Trificator everyone except you will turn into a triangle!!!

Controls:

  • Left click or space to shoot

Music: “Lone Wolf”, from PlayOnLoop.com

Aaaand, there is a thing. In the code I missplaced an F instead of a G, and I fixed this like 3 minutes passed the 3 hours, so I don't know if that counts to not go for the 1st place. In any case, I really enjoyed making this game!
